doc.field: Marriages Thomas H. Clark and illeg. illeg/ Drury Blair and Chloe F. Coleman was Marriad the 8 th of November. 1827 — Wm, J, Fulton & C. U. Blair were married the 18 th of July 1867

Births Thomas H. Clark was born the third day of December 1786 Drury Blair was born the illeg. twentyeth of March 1801 — Chloe F. Blair was born the ninth October, 1801 - William Johnson Blair was born the nineteenth September 1828 John Suter Blair was born the twentyeth of November 1829— Polly Ann Blair was born the Eleventh February 1831 — Chloe Unity Blair was Born the fourth March 1833 — America M. Blair was Born 19 th of February 1835 — Joseph Dickinson Blair was Born the thirteenth of March 1837 — Drury Addison Blair was Born the 11 th of May 1830 Lucy Smith Blair was Born the 15 September 1841 Penmelia Fame Blair was Born 17 November 1843 — Wm, J, Fulton was born the 5 th of July 1821

Deaths Thomas H. Clark Died on Tuesday 9 th Novem- ber 1829 Polley Blair Died March the 24 th 1831 James Blair Died May the 28 th 1840 James Suter Blair Died November 10 th 1849 Lucy Smith Blair Died August 9 th 1854 Chloe Tue. Blair Died September 12 th 1854 Drury Addison Blair Died June 27 th 1864 Drury Blair Died September 2 nd 1864 Chloe Unity Fulton died Nov the 5 th 1875
blair family records a machine readable transcription
